subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – an eye pierced by a dagger. This may be interpreted as {{och-l|盲|blind}} or “slave < to enslave by blinding”.

subSections.title: Definitions
